original_text: Rehoboam made his authority as king in Jerusalem very strong. He was 41 years old when he became king. He ruled for 17 years in Jerusalem. That was the city that the Lord had chosen out of all the tribes of Israel. He chose it as the place where people would give honour to his name. Rehoboam's mother was an Ammonite woman. Her name was Naamah.
korean_text: 르호보암 왕은 예루살렘에서 스스로 세력을 굳게 하여 다스리니라 르호보암이 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 사십일 세라 예루살렘 곧 여호와께서 이스라엘의 모든 지파 중에서 택하여 그의 이름을 두신 성에서 십칠 년 동안 다스리니라 르호보암의 어머니의 이름은 나아마요 암몬 여인이더라

sentences.original_text: Rehoboam made his authority as king in Jerusalem very strong
sentences.korean_translation: 르호보암은 예루살렘에서 왕으로서의 권위를 매우 강하게 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: He was 41 years old when he became king
He ruled for 17 years in Jerusalem
That was the city that the Lord had chosen
out of all the tribes of Israel
He chose it as the place
where people would give honour to his name
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그의 이름에게 영광을 돌릴 곳으로

sentences.original_text: Rehoboam's mother was an Ammonite woman
